stepTitle: A sample of oxygen gas is compressed at a constant external pressure of $$40.0$$ atm from an initial volume of 1,200 L to a final volume of $$850$$ L. Calculate the work done on the gas during compression, and express your answer in joules.
stepBody: Compute your answer to the nearest integer.\n(Use the conversion factor: $$1$$ L·atm $$=$$ $$101.3$$ J)
